title: The Serious Sam Collection NTSC/U Xbox 360
description:
The Serious Sam Collection:

Region      : NTSC/U                Languages: English        
Size        : 1 DVD                 Genre    : Shooter         
Platform    : XBOX 360              Date     : 07/2013

About:

This collection is a throwback to the days of pure FPS destruction. There isn't much added story, character development, or fancy plot twists - all that would just take away time you could be blowing stuff up! Mow down wave after wave of enemies in four games' worth of deliciously chaotic FPS action: Serious Sam: The First Encounter, Serious Sam: The Second Encounter, Serious Sam: BFE (plus Jewel of the Nile content pack), and Serious Sam: Double D XXL. Play as the infamous, iron-jawed hero and battle the forces of the alien ruler, Mental, who's unleashed his minions upon Earth. Welcome them to the planet with rocket launchers, chainsaws, flamethrowers, and a general hail of gunfire in classic shooter play that's an all-out action assault.
